p: Some studies have reported that COVID-19 may damage CNS. Some observed symptoms include losing the senses of smell, taste or vision, and decreasing alertness [ 68]. Also, seizures, stroke, and acute necrotizing hemorrhagic encephalopathy have been reported in patients with severe COVID-19 infection [ 69]. Therapeutic results have shown that neurological symptoms gradually decrease in patients receiving viral encephalitis treatment [ 70].
